name: Who I Am
details: I am a recent University graduate.
I have graduated with a Bachelor of Science, Computer Science from Ontario Tech University.
I am always looking for new interesting projects to work on and attempt to grow my portfolio.

name: How It Started
details: Around 2015 is when I first found an interest in Software Development.
It all generally began with my interest in wanting to create Plugins for Minecraft.
I began following Youtube Tutorials to learn everything I could about how these plugins are created and what features were possible.
This lead into Java being my very first programming language.
From there my interest grew more. I started learning more indepth features of the game like NMS and Forge modding.
Then I expanded my skills and began learning C++ for Reverse Engineering, Python, C#, and many other languages.
